# ClaimPolicyConfig.AddPolicy method

Add a policy by name.

```csharp
public void AddPolicy(string policyName, ClaimRule rule)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| policyName | The name of the policy to set. |
| rule | The [`ClaimRule`](../ClaimRule) to associate with the specified policy name. |
